tags.name: chatgpt-plugin-create-video-endpoint
tags.description: ChatGPT Plugin Create Video Endpoint. This endpoint is used to create video and return a link to the video and claim code for saving the video.

post.summary: API to create a video and return a link to the video and a claim code for saving the video

requestBody.description: Request body containing user-defined inputs for the video.

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio for the video, representing the width-to-height ratio of the video frame, expressed as a ratio (e.g., 16:9, 9:16, 1:1) or a description (e.g., "widescreen," "portrait," "square").

publish_platform.description: The platform or service where to publish or share the video, including popular platforms like YouTube, Vimeo, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Visla, or any other video-sharing platform.

video_content.description: The user specified subject and purpose of the video, outlining the overall theme and narrative.
video_content.example: A motivational video for people struggling with self-doubt

video_idea.description: A brief description of the concept for the video, including subject matter, storyline, message, and other creative elements that shape the video.
video_idea.example: Combine powerful quotes, inspiring imagery, and uplifting music to create an emotional and motivating experience

video_tone.description: The emotional atmosphere and mood of the video, influenced by language, pacing, and presentation, guiding the audience's reaction and setting the overall feel, such as informative, persuasive, or humorous.

video_type.description: the format or genre of the video, such as educational, promotional, documentary, tutorial, or entertainment.

video_pace.description: The intended speed and rhythm of the video, which can create different moods and emotional reactions from the audience. Examples can include slow, medium, fast, etc.

title.description: The name or title of the video. It is a concise summary that reflects the content of the video and is typically used to attract viewer's attention and provide a clue about the video's content.
title.example: Mastering Self-Doubt: A Journey Towards Self-Belief

description.description: A detailed summary of the video's content. This is typically used to provide more information about the video, such as the topics covered, featured guests or locations, or the purpose of the video. It also often includes keywords to help viewers find the video through search.
description.example: Join us on this motivational journey where we tackle the issue of self-doubt, using inspiring quotes, powerful imagery, and uplifting music. Let's boost your self-confidence and reshape your perspective towards life.

tags.description: Tags or keywords associated with the video. These are used to help categorize the video and make it more discoverable to users searching for related content. Tags can be single words or short phrases related to the video's subject, theme, or context.

moods.description: The emotional tone of the background music.

genres.description: The musical style of the background music.

instruments.description: The instruments used in the background music.
